title: Stormy Abstractions.
content: Stormy Abstractions is a website dedicated to showcasing the beauty and power of thunderstorms through abstract interpretations. Our collection of wallpapers features unique designs that capture the essence of a thunderstorm, from the electrifying lightning strikes to the deep rumbling of thunder. Each wallpaper is carefully crafted to provide a stunning visual experience that will leave you in awe. Whether you're a weather enthusiast or simply appreciate beautiful art, our collection has something for everyone. Explore our gallery today and discover the captivating world of stormy abstractions. ‚ö°Ô∏èüå©Ô∏è

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract interpretation of a thunderstorm"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
